Name: Battle Imagine - Mighty Colossus
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Mighty Colossus's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Invisible Impact.

Stunt! Invisible Impact
Transform into Elite: Mighty Colossus to charge and deal Attack Damage. The longer the charge, the higher the Resilience Break Efficiency. Each stack increases the Resilience Break done by 50%. (Starts with 3 stacks at Tier 3 and 6 stacks at Tier 5.)
Upon the skill cast, your Resilience Break Bonus is increased for a period.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
